summary:
3.2. Financial, banking, and insurance measures:

* Transfers of funds between EU and Iranian persons, entities, or bodies without authorization or notification
* Opening of new branches, subsidiaries, or representative offices of Iranian banks in EU territories
* Provision of insurance or reinsurance to Iran or the Government of Iran
* Supply of specialized financial messaging services to Iranian natural or legal persons, entities, or bodies
* Entering into commitments by EU Member States to provide financial support for trade with Iran
The Security Council document 2231 (2015) outlines specific sanctions relief measures related to Iran. 

The following transactions are allowed: 

3.2.6. Sale or purchase of public or public-guaranteed bonds to and from Iran, 
the Government of Iran, the Central Bank of Iran, or Iranian banks and 
financial institutions or persons acting on their behalf.

 Transactions related to oil, gas, and petrochemical sectors are allowed: 
3.3.1. Import, purchase, swap or transport of Iranian crude oil and petroleum 
products, natural gas or petrochemical products and related financing; 
3.3.2. Sale, supply, transfer or export of equipment or technology for 
exploration, production and refining of oil and natural gas; 
3.3.3. Granting of financial loans or credits to Iranian persons engaged in 
these sectors.

In shipping, shipbuilding, and transport sectors: 
3.4.1. Sale, supply, transfer or export of naval equipment and technology; 
3.4.2. Access to EU airports for Iranian cargo flights; 
3.4.3. Cessation of inspection, seizure and disposal of cargoes; 
3.4.4. Provision of bunkering, ship supply services, fuel, engineering and 
maintenance services to Iranian vessels and cargo aircraft.

Transactions related to gold, precious metals, banknotes, and coinage: 
3.5.1. Sale, supply, purchase, export, transfer or transport of gold and 
precious metals to, from or for the Government of Iran; 
3.5.2. Delivery of newly printed or minted Iranian banknotes and coinage.

 Metals: 
3.6.1. Sale, supply, transfer or export of graphite and raw or semi-finished 
metals to any Iranian person or for use in Iran.

 Software: 
3.7.1. Sale, supply, transfer or export of software for integrating industrial 
processes to any Iranian person or for use in Iran.
